name: enhanced-flow-trigger
description: Trigger a Power Automate or Azure Logic Apps flow from SharePoint while selecting one or more items.
author: cup o'365

scripts.init: npm i && gulp bundle --production && gulp trust-dev-cert && gulp serve --nobrowser
scripts.run: gulp bundle --production && gulp trust-dev-cert && gulp serve --nobrowser
scripts.run-uat: gulp bundle --uat && gulp trust-dev-cert && gulp serve --nobrowser
scripts.run-tst: gulp bundle --test && gulp trust-dev-cert && gulp serve --nobrowser
scripts.run-dev: gulp bundle --development && gulp trust-dev-cert && gulp serve --nobrowser
scripts.package-doc: gulp switch-list-type --list doc && gulp bundle --ship --production && gulp package-solution --ship
scripts.package-list: gulp switch-list-type --list list && gulp bundle --ship --production && gulp package-solution --ship
scripts.package-doc-uat: gulp switch-list-type --list doc && gulp bundle --ship --uat && gulp package-solution --ship
scripts.package-list-uat: gulp switch-list-type --list list && gulp bundle --ship --uat && gulp package-solution --ship
scripts.package-doc-tst: gulp switch-list-type --list doc && gulp bundle --ship --test && gulp package-solution --ship
scripts.package-list-tst: gulp switch-list-type --list list && gulp bundle --ship --test && gulp package-solution --ship
scripts.package-doc-dev: gulp switch-list-type --list doc && gulp bundle --ship --development && gulp package-solution --ship
scripts.package-list-dev: gulp switch-list-type --list list && gulp bundle --ship --development && gulp package-solution --ship
